descriptionType.name: descriptionType

options.name: Set Automatically
options.description: Automatically set based on resource and operation

descriptionType.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

toolDescription.name: toolDescription
toolDescription.description: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often
toolDescription.ai_hint: Explain to the LLM what this tool does, a good, specific description would allow LLMs to produce expected results much more often

resource.name: resource
resource.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

operation.name: operation
operation.ai_hint: 根据 REST 规范选择方法: 查询用 GET，创建用 POST，更新用 PUT/PATCH。

PolicyDN.name: PolicyDN
PolicyDN.description: The folder DN for the new certificate. If the value is missing, the folder name is the system default. If no system default is configured
PolicyDN.ai_hint: The folder DN for the new certificate. If the value is missing, the folder name is the system default. If no system default is configured

Subject.name: Subject
Subject.description: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (DN)
Subject.ai_hint: The Common Name field for the certificate Subject (DN)

additionalFields.name: additionalFields

options.name: PKCS10
options.description: The PKCS#10 policy Signing Request (CSR). Omit escape characters such as or . If this value is provided, any Subject DN fields and the KeyBitSize in the request are ignored.

additionalFields.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

binaryProperty.name: binaryProperty
binaryProperty.description: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded
binaryProperty.ai_hint: The name of the input field containing the binary file data to be uploaded

certificateId.name: certificateId
certificateId.description: A GUID that uniquely identifies the certificate
certificateId.ai_hint: A GUID that uniquely identifies the certificate

returnAll.name: returnAll
returnAll.description: Whether to return all results or only up to a given limit

limit.name: limit
limit.description: Max number of results to return
limit.ai_hint: Max number of results to return

options.name: options
fields
options.description: Include one or more of the following certificate attributes in the return value

options.ai_hint: 此参数为 fixedCollection，包含嵌套字段，不要扁平化。

certificateDN.name: certificateDN
certificateDN.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the certificate to renew
certificateDN.ai_hint: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the certificate to renew

policyDn.name: policyDn
policyDn.description: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the policy folder
policyDn.ai_hint: The Distinguished Name (DN) of the policy folder

conditional_rules: IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'PolicyDN'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'Subject'
IF operation == 'create' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateDn'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'download' THEN SHOW parameter 'includePrivateKey'
IF resource == 'certificate' AND operation == 'download' AND includePrivateKey == True THEN SHOW parameter 'password'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'binaryProperty'
IF operation == 'download' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation IN ["get", "delete"] AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateId'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'returnAll'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' AND returnAll == False THEN SHOW parameter 'limit'
IF operation == 'getMany' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'options'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'certificateDN'
IF operation == 'renew' AND resource == 'certificate' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'policy' THEN SHOW parameter 'policyDn'
IF operation == 'get' AND resource == 'policy' THEN SHOW parameter 'additionalFields'
